text.text: Hi, I'm Spark :wave: I'm your personal assistant here at Somo!
I'm a smart little robot that can make your work life a little easier. I can do things like update your slack status to mirror your calendar, handle your annual leave and more.

elements.text: My source code is <http://github.com/SomoGlobal/somo-spark-bot|open source on GitHub>. Please report any bugs by <http://github.com/SomoGlobal/somo-spark-bot/issues|creating an issue>.
